pages.title: Saving Content
pages.description: Add documents to your knowledge base by uploading files or submitting raw content. The system automatically analyzes your content, extracting structured frames (sections, claims, definitions, etc.) and building a navigable knowledge graph.

pages.title: Retrieving Context
pages.description: The `/search` endpoint is your primary interface for retrieving relevant context from your knowledge base. It combines semantic search with intelligent filtering and returns results as a clean, recursive node structure.

pages.title: Retrieving Graphs
pages.description: Your knowledge base is stored as a graph, where documents contain frames (sections, claims, definitions) connected by relationships. The tree and node endpoints let you navigate this structure.
